meanings.definition: A television show or movie that is broadcast again.
meanings.sent1: I love watching reruns of my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent2: The channel is airing reruns of classic movies this weekend.
meanings.sent3: My brother always falls asleep during reruns of that show.
meanings.sent4: Reruns are like comfort food for the soul, familiar and soothing.
meanings.sent5: Reruns bring back memories of lazy Sundays and popcorn.

meanings.definition: To broadcast a television show or movie again.
meanings.sent1: They will rerun the episode next week for those who missed it.
meanings.sent2: The network decided to rerun the movie due to popular demand.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rerun the same show twice on TV, oops!
meanings.sent4: Sometimes life feels like a never-ending rerun of the same old story.
meanings.sent5: The laughter from the audience filled the room as they reran the comedy show.
